text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Ehh, you're gonna carry that much by yourself? It's for the science room, right? Leave it to me, I'll help out!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Thanks for always cleaning up this place! I'll go throw this trash away now!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Fuuu! Good work out there! Today's run felt really good, and it was fun.
As usual, Kitasan Black was helping people as if it was natural. On top of that, it wasn't causing any issues with her training.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Oh, that's right! There was something I wanted to ask Trainer-san… about the timing of when to drive in, um-

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: I see! So the way you pivot is important. Stay aware of the balance between your pivot foot and lower body, your center of gravity… I see, I see.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Um, is it okay if I go run a bit more? Trainer-san, I want to test out what you just taught me as soon as possible.
choice_data_list: Alright, but only for a little bit

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Thank you very much! Allllright! I'm gonna reduce my time～!
The profile of Kitasan Black as she was running was beautiful and intense, it was captivating.
Always proceeding forward, Kitasan Black was overflowing with ambition. Her presence helped raise the morale of those around her-
choice_data_list:
(Kitasan's working hard, I 
have to respond in kind!)

(Kitasan's working hard, I 
have to respond in kind!)

text_block_list.text: I rubbed my tired eyes, and lightly slapped my own cheeks. It was my duty to sincerely work hard for her sake, so I needed to keep myself motivated.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: And so, you see, Dad?! Trainer-san is amazing!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: The training is tough but, even I can feel that it's really making me stronger-

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Whenever I have doubts, he clears them up, and he's always adjusting the training menu based on what happens during the day!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Yeah, that's right. I'm always really really worried and sometimes I can't even come up with a proper answer but…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Hmmm, it's not working! The more I try to ignore it, the more I end up focusing too much on who's behind me.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: But even if I could, only focusing on what's ahead makes me uneasy…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Ah, well… something like whether or not they're making their move. Or if they're coming up really quickly behind me, or something.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: In those cases, I should probably just face them head-to-head, right? But, if I'm too focused on them, I won't be able to run properly…
choice_data_list: Kitasan, what's your running style again?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: My running style?…is "Escape". Running and running, making sure to stay in front.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Staying strong until the end, no matter who comes up behind me, going fast enough to make sure nobody can pass me.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Pulling away from those following, and reaching the goal first… that's the way I run!
choice_data_list:
Even with that, you focus 
on the ones behind you?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: …-Ah.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, always seems to have the answer to what's bothering me but, that's not all either.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: The times he says we should think about things together, even if I can't think of any answers, he'll give me advice.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: I want to be someone cool like that. Being able to analyze anything so effortlessly, someone like that-

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: …eh?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: … Well, that's…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: I see, that's right. …it should have been so obvious, though.
At her father's words, Kitasan Black must have realized something. With the way she clenched her fists, it seems she had come to a decision.
